name: AXXX - West Dapto - ITC 006 (ITP006) - Open Drains
template name: AXXX - West Dapto - ITC 006 (ITP006) - Open Drains

name: REQUIREMENTS / REFERENCE: Project Safety Plan, Project Environment Plan
• All site personnel inducted, required SWMS completed and signed, Safety Plan approved
• ERSED controls installed on site, air quality visually monitored for dust etc due to construction activities, Environment Plan approved
• Contact DBYD and complete excavation permit, extent of works set out with survey pegs
• HOLD POINT: 10 days prior to commencement on site, submit to the Principal, a road opening permit
• Geotextile material conforms to requirements of Project Drawings and Specifications
COMMENTS / ATTACHMENTS: Details of geofabric / geotextile used on site
• HOLD POINT: Submit details of procedures / devices to maintain effective drainage of the work area during construction, 10 days prior to site commencement
• HOLD POINT: 5 days prior to set-out of the open drain, submit to the Principal details of any changes to the design of the open drain (if required)
• WITNESS POINT: 3 days prior to set-out, provide a notice of inspection to the Principal
• WITNESS POINT: 1 day before setting out, provide notice to the Principal of the location of open drains
• WITNESS POINT: Provide notice to the Principal of the grade of the excavated open drain

• WITNESS POINT: In the event of overexcavation or excavation below the level of the natural channel, backfill with suitable material and compact. Provide notice of the Principal of backfilling with suitable material (if applicable)

• WITNESS POINT: In the event of surplus material, place excavated material to form embankments to lower side of drains or remove spoil stockpiles as required. Provide notice to the Principal of backfilling with suitable material (if applicable)
• WITNESS POINT: Provide notice to the Principal of the location of table drains, swales and depressed medians (if applicable)
• Compact the excavated material to no less than 95% for standard compactive effort, to AS 1289.5.4.1
• Spread topsoil, line channel with organic fibre mat or geotextile as per Project Drawings and Specifications
• Complete any vegetation within 7 days of the open drain excavation
QA ENGINEER / SPE / PE SIGN OFF
